name: Slash Duel
description:
This game was made as a group effort as part of a small game jam by 4 members.

Credit:
-Me: programming, balancing
-Troy Lim: Background art
-Irena: Character models
Ben: UI and Particles

Controls:
Player 1:
-A: block attack
-D: fake out
-Double tap D: Attack

Player 2:
-Right arrow: block attack
-Left arrow: fake out
-Double tap Left arrow: Attack
